items.sentence: I don\'t think it\'s likely that Tom will come over this time of night.
Tom has been meaning to clean out his badly cluttered garage for years.
When Mary and I were married, we used to go bowling with Tom and Alice.
Tom took out his driver\'s license and handed it to the police officer.
Do you think anyone will be able to overhear what we\'re talking about?
Tom is pretty good at juggling, but Mary doesn\'t seem to be impressed.
Tom knew that he wasn\'t going to be able to convince Mary to help him.
Tom knows he\'ll never be able to play the French horn as well as Mary.
Tom asked Mary some very personal questions that she refused to answer.
Tom began to sing "Happy Birthday" and the entire restaurant joined in.
